column4: Can I get the ubuntu update log or something? Is it saved on my comp? (I updated from 8.04 to 8.10)
check in /var/log, especially /var/log/dpkg.log and /var/log/installer. I believe there's a log somewhere around there, but I forget where exactly it is
thnx.. you think there are any clues in that log of what's wrong with my upgrade?
not sure, I'm not too experienced with upgrades (usually just reinstall)
